alert.note: Alert for Buffalo; Kearney (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 5:15PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Kearney and southern Buffalo Counties through 545 PM CDT... At 515 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Elm Creek, or 12 miles west of Kearney, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Odessa around 520 PM CDT. Riverdale around 530 PM CDT. Kearney around 535 PM CDT. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 259 and 282. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for south central Nebraska.
